mapper.insert:
SELECT CONCAT('salmonth_', (max(CAST(substring(month_num,10) AS DECIMAL))+1)) FROM sal_month AS dataNum
INSERT INTO sal_month(month_num, month_data, month_date, month_pay, month_normal, month_bonus, month_malus, month_ann, month_vehicle, month_meal, month_overtime, month_night, month_holi, month_gukmin, month_geongang, month_khoyong, month_janggi, month_sanjae, month_schexpan, month_income, month_loincome, month_addpay, month_pricepay, month_sumpay, month_adddeduct, month_pricededuct, month_sumdeduct) VALUES( #{dataNum}, #{dataData}, #{dataDate}, #{dataPay}, #{dataNormal}, #{dataBonus}, #{dataMalus}, #{dataAnn}, #{dataVehicle}, #{dataMeal}, #{dataOvertime}, #{dataNight}, #{dataHoli}, #{dataGukmin}, #{dataGeongang}, #{dataKhoyong}, #{dataJanggi}, #{dataSanjae}, #{dataSchexpan}, #{dataIncome}, #{dataLoincome}, #{dataAddpay}, #{dataPricepay}, #{dataSumpay}, #{dataAdddeduct}, #{dataPricededuct}, #{dataSumdeduct} )
mapper.select: SELECT data_num AS dataNum, data_emp AS dataEmp, staff_name AS staffName, level_name AS levelName, human_num AS humanNum, company_in_date AS companyInDate, company_out_date AS companyOutDate, staff_nationality AS staffNationality, staff_country AS staffCountry, staff_phone AS staffPhone, staff_email AS staffEmail, data_insu AS dataInsu, data_resi AS dataResi, data_pro AS dataPro, data_bank AS dataBank, data_account AS dataAccount, data_host AS dataHost, data_scrib AS dataScrib, data_bate AS dataBate, data_bate_per AS dataBatePer, data_bate_date1 AS dataBateDate1, data_bate_date2 AS dataBateDate2, data_expen AS dataExpen, data_expen_date1 AS dataExpenDate1, data_expen_date2 AS dataExpenDate2, data_taxdepart AS dataTaxdepart, data_tax AS dataTax, data_tax_date1 AS dataTaxDate1, data_tax_date2 AS dataTaxDate2 FROM sal_data a INNER join is_staff b INNER join is_level c INNER join is_staff_basic_info d ON a.data_emp = b.staff_num AND b.staff_level_code = c.level_code AND b.staff_num = d.staff_num WHERE data_emp = #{dataEmp}

SELECT insurance_youlpyo_code AS insuranceYoulpyoCode, gukmin_staff_percent AS gukminStaffPercent, gukmin_lower_limit_amount AS gukminLowerLimitAmount, gukmin_upper_limit_amount AS gukminUpperLimitAmount, gunkang_staff_percent AS gunkangStaffPercent, gunkang_lower_limit_amount AS gunkangLowerLimitAmount, gunkang_upper_limit_amount AS gunkangUpperLimitAmount, jangki_staff_percent AS jangkiStaffPercent, jangki_lower_limit_amount AS jangkiLowerLimitAmount, jangki_upper_limit_amount AS jangkiUpperLimitAmount, goyong_staff_percent AS goyongStaffPercent, sanjae_staff_percent AS sanjaeStaffPercent, application_month AS applicationMonth, application_end_month AS applicationEndMonth, reg_date AS regDate FROM is_insurance_youlpyo WHERE application_month < NOW() AND application_end_month > NOW() limit 1
SELECT staff_basic_salary FROM is_staff a INNER JOIN sal_data b ON a.staff_num = b.data_emp WHERE data_num = #{dataNum}

SELECT CASE WHEN count(prize_price) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(prize_price) END FROM is_prize_list a INNER JOIN sal_data b ON a.staff_num = b.data_emp WHERE data_num = #{dataNum} AND YEAR(given_date) = LEFT(#{searchDate}, 4) AND DATE_FORMAT(given_date, '%m') = right(#{searchDate}, 2)

SELECT CASE WHEN count(punishment_price) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(punishment_price) END FROM is_punishment_list a INNER JOIN sal_data b ON a.staff_num = b.data_emp WHERE data_num = #{dataNum} AND YEAR(given_date) = LEFT(#{searchDate}, 4) AND DATE_FORMAT(given_date, '%m') = right(#{searchDate}, 2)

SELECT data_num, data_emp, staff_name, level_name, human_num, company_in_date, company_out_date, staff_nationality, staff_country, staff_phone, staff_email, data_insu, data_resi, data_pro, data_bank, data_account, data_host, data_scrib, data_bate, data_bate_per, data_bate_date1, data_bate_date2, data_expen, data_expen_date1, data_expen_date2, data_taxdepart, data_tax, data_tax_date1, data_tax_date2 FROM sal_data a INNER join is_staff b INNER join is_level c INNER join is_staff_basic_info d ON a.data_emp = b.staff_num AND b.staff_level_code = c.level_code AND b.staff_num = d.staff_num limit 1

SELECT staff_num AS staffNum, staff_name AS staffName, level_name AS levelName, jojic_name AS jojicName, data_num AS dataNum FROM is_staff a INNER join is_level b INNER join is_jojic c INNER join sal_data d ON a.staff_level_code=b.level_code AND a.jojic_code=c.jojic_code AND a.staff_num=d.data_emp
staff_num like '%${searchText}%'
staff_name like '%${searchText}%'
level_code like '%${searchLevel}%'
a.jojic_code like '%${searchJojic}%'
SELECT pay_num AS payNum, pay_name AS payName, pay_tax AS payTax, pay_sal AS paySal, pay_perdepart AS payPerdepart, pay_per AS payPer FROM sal_pay WHERE pay_sal = 1

SELECT deduct_num AS deductNum, deduct_name AS deductName, deduct_account AS deductAccount, deduct_sal AS deductSal, deduct_perdepart AS deductPerdepart, deduct_per AS deductPer FROM sal_deduct WHERE deduct_sal = 1

SELECT month_num AS dataNum, month_data AS dataData, month_date AS dataDate, month_pay AS dataPay, month_normal AS dataNormal, month_bonus AS dataBonus, month_malus AS dataMalus, month_ann AS dataAnn, month_vehicle AS dataVehicle, month_meal AS dataMeal, month_overtime AS dataOvertime, month_night AS dataNight, month_holi AS dataHoli, month_gukmin AS dataGukmin, month_geongang AS dataGeongang, month_khoyong AS dataKhoyong, month_janggi AS dataJanggi, month_sanjae AS dataSangae, month_schexpan AS dataSchexpan, month_income AS dataIncome, month_loincome AS dataLoincome, month_addpay AS dataAddpay, month_pricepay AS dataPricepay, month_sumpay AS dataSumpay, month_adddeduct AS dataAdddeduct, month_pricededuct AS dataPricededuct, month_sumdeduct AS dataSumdeduct FROM sal_month WHERE month_data = #{dataNum} AND right(month_date, 2) = right(#{searchDate}, 2) AND LEFT(month_date, 4) = LEFT(#{searchDate}, 4)
SELECT DISTINCT(LEFT(month_date, 4)) AS getYear FROM sal_month ORDER BY getYear DESC

SELECT staff_num AS staffNum, staff_name AS staffName, data_num AS dataNum, level_name AS levelName, jojic_name AS jojicName FROM is_staff a INNER join is_level b INNER join is_jojic c INNER join sal_data d ON a.staff_level_code=b.level_code AND a.jojic_code=c.jojic_code AND a.staff_num=d.data_emp ORDER BY staffNum
